author: shamatar
content: It may be better to have two branchless multiplication functions: one for a case when top bit of the modulus is 0 and another one when it is 1. Also, I should note that AddMod doesn’t look valid in a case when top bit of the modulus is set, cause you discard a carry in Add function

author: shamatar
content: Also you comparison will be “false” when out == modulus, but you have to reduce in this case too

author: shamatar
content: It may have been better to have 383 bit modular arithmetic opcode that removes a lot of branching in the code
